name: Gnosis Protocol
description:
Gnosis Protocol is a cyberpunk, post-apocalyptic interactive fiction game where you make the decisions for Angelica Tecell, an assassin for hire, who accepts the job to end all jobs from a mysterious figure for more money than she's ever imagined. But she gets more than she bargained for when she starts losing her powers with each assassination.

(Game is a work-in-progress and there are many bugs and animations are temporary.)

Written & Created by Matthew Tibbenham

Music by pdkmusic (https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/sci-fi-music-pack-1/)

Art by Klaus Pillon (https://www.artstation.com/artwork/aRqk0)

Tyler Warren (https://tylerjwarren.itch.io/)

Archeia (https://archeia.itch.io/visustella-world-urban-city)

UI Art by Wenrexa (https://opengameart.org/content/assets-ui-minimalism-scifi)

Created with Ink and Fungus in Unity

Made for IS71073B: Interactive Fiction and Digital Storytelling course at Goldsmiths, University of London

Read the Postmortem at https://matthewtibbenham.medium.com/gnosis-protocol-postmortem-20f200b731f2
